channel.title: Where do I change the MiniMap Icon?
channel.description: The title says it all. I've been looking through all the sprites in client.java and I can't seem to find it. It's the PI client that comes with all dupes fix. Also, I don't want an answer like "Open it in cache editor and change the sprite there!"... DURP!!!! It's not in there... So I need to do what I believe they call "hard code" it in... :I

item.title: Where do I change the MiniMap Icon?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

You were able to view it in Tom’s Cache Suite? Or in your sprites folder? You threw me off a little there. If it’s in your cache, I can walk you though how to modify it and not corrupt your cache.

Read full topic
item.source: Where do I change the MiniMap Icon?

item.title: Where do I change the MiniMap Icon?
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

How stupid do you think I am? D: I’ve looked over it 6 times… Once again, I have a file called Media.dat. The one that you told me to go to is media.jag. :I
Edit:
Do you know the unpacking code for it? I can just link my image to my cache…

Yep! It’s in the Media.dat in my sprites folder… Now my next question which I shall post in general coding is how do i edit .dat/.idx files :L

Read full topic
item.source: Where do I change the MiniMap Icon?

item.title: Where do I change the MiniMap Icon?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

View/Edit_Image_Archives -> Media -> O.K -> It should be in there.

Using Tom’s Cache Suite.

Read full topic
item.source: Where do I change the MiniMap Icon?

item.title: Where do I change the MiniMap Icon?
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:4, topic:437135”]Is there a hover for the map icon that is currently there?

If not, that sprite is probably ON the map-back, you’ll have to edit the map-back itself.

If it’s not in the pre-loaded Sprites, it’s in the Cache.[/quote]Is there a possibility that it’s in a file called Media.dat? Cause its in neither… unless my cache is meesed up cause i was having trouble extracting it before… Can’t be that last one, I checked all the files are there that are supposed to be. It must be in that Media.dat thingy.

Read full topic
item.source: Where do I change the MiniMap Icon?

item.title: Where do I change the MiniMap Icon?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Is there a hover for the map icon that is currently there?

If not, that sprite is probably ON the map-back, you’ll have to edit the map-back itself.

If it’s not in the pre-loaded Sprites, it’s in the Cache.

Read full topic
item.source: Where do I change the MiniMap Icon?

item.title: Where do I change the MiniMap Icon?
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

I wunna replace this:

with this:

But this:

isn’t in the cache (I’m pretty sure it’s in another thing called Media.dat in the sprites). So I need to know where in the client.java (under setting up all the mapback and other gameframe stuff if it’s even in client.java) the code to load the world map icon is. I searched for like 3 hours and I still couldn’t find it. Better explained? (BTW This is the client that comes with the Original PI All Dupes Fixed).

Read full topic
